customer_reviews.title: Great, respectable set for your casual, everyday wine

Wide Bowl - Derive the most pleasure possible out of your red wine. Swirling the wine allows the aroma and flavor to emerge to the fullest. It is great for all red wines like cabernet sauvignon, merlot, pinot noir, Bordeaux, etc

Perfectly Designed - Laser cut rim is significantly thinner than the standard. When the wine reaches your lips, you will taste it fully without the feel of glass in your mouth. For Any Occasion - This Dinner glasses is amazing for parties, dinners, wine tasting, and special events for outdoors and indoors. Makes an appreciated present for men, holiday, wedding shower, or housewarming
